text: My vidsylaly poslantsiv dlya toho, shchob yim korylysya z dozvolu Allaha. Yakby [lytsemiry], vchynyvshy nespravedlyvistʹ do samykh sebe, pryyshly do tebe ta poprosyly proshchennya u Allaha, a Poslanetsʹ prosyv by proshchennya dlya nykh, to vy znayshly b Allaha Pryymayuchym kayattya, Myloserdnym
